Entries.DialogueText: A stranger?... Hello.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A stranger?... Hello.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't mind me. I just live out here alone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't mind me. I just live out here alone.

Entries.DialogueText: This means a lot to me, {Farmer_Name}. I'll save it for a quiet day in the tent. Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This means a lot to me, . I'll save it for a quiet day in the tent. Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: I don't usually read books... But this one is right up my 'alley'... Thank you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't usually read s... But this one is right up my 'alley'... Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: That's a good find! I'm always happy when eating wild food. Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's a good find! I'm always happy when eating wild food. Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: I thought about tying the knot, once. But now, I'm happily married to the wind rustling in the leaves, and the frogs croaking under the silver moon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I thought about tying the knot, once. But now, I'm happily married to the wind rustling in the leaves, and the frogs croaking under the silver moon.

Entries.DialogueText: All these strange trees will be gone tomorrow... it's one of the mysteries of nature.
Entries.DisplayPattern: All these strange trees will be gone tomorrow... it's one of the mysteries of nature.

Entries.DialogueText: How did the moss harvest go? Hehe... My bed is a lot softer now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: How did the moss harvest go? Hehe... My bed is a lot softer now.

Entries.DialogueText: I've already gathered enough moss for the entire year. How about you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've already gathered enough moss for the entire year. How about you?

Entries.DialogueText: Let me see... it looks perfect. You're a good student, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let me see... it looks perfect. You're a good student, .

Entries.DialogueText: No, thank you. I have no desire for money... In fact, I think it's cursed. [166]
Entries.DisplayPattern: No, thank you. I have no desire for money... In fact, I think it's cursed.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, that looks fresh. I'll be eating good tonight! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, that looks fresh. I'll be eating good tonight!

Entries.DialogueText: What do you have there? Looks like it would make good bait. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you have there? Looks like it would make good bait.

Entries.DialogueText: My old friend, the glimmering boulder, has moved on. It may not seem like an important event, but to me it's a big change.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My old friend, the glimmering boulder, has moved on. It may not seem like an important event, but to me it's a big change.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy for the old rock to see more of the world, though. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy for the old rock to see more of the world, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Very few people have gone as deep into the mines as you have.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Very few people have gone as deep into the mines as you have.

Entries.DialogueText: The water here comes from glaciers high up in the mountains.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The water here comes from glaciers high up in the mountains.

Entries.DialogueText: I traveled to the source once, just to pay my respects to the water.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I traveled to the source once, just to pay my respects to the water.

Entries.DialogueText: Movie theater? Hmm... for me, the slow procession of nature is all the drama I need.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Movie theater? Hmm... for me, the slow procession of nature is all the drama I need.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... me? I usually wouldn't, but... okay. It's nice of you to think about me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... me? I usually wouldn't, but... okay. It's nice of you to think about me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll head over there in a little while.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll head over there in a little while.

Entries.DialogueText: Find anything good? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Find anything good?

Entries.DialogueText: The crisp air of the wilderness is all I care to know.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The crisp air of the wilderness is all I care to know.

Entries.DialogueText: I live out here by choice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I live out here by choice.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Have you come to ridicule me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Have you come to ridicule me?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just minding my own business.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just minding my own business.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't know you well enough to trust you. Sorry.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't know you well enough to trust you. Sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Hmm? Do you want something from me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Hmm? Do you want something from me?

Entries.DialogueText: Please don't destroy my tent.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please don't destroy my tent.

Entries.DialogueText: It's happened before. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's happened before.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy by myself, you know.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy by myself, you know.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't need new friends.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't need new friends.

Entries.DialogueText: It would be nice if the townspeople could accept me for who I am. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It would be nice if the townspeople could accept me for who I am.

Entries.DialogueText: I like living out here in the open air. That's what they don't understand.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like living out here in the open air. That's what they don't understand.

Entries.DialogueText: You can learn to survive in the wild. I have.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can learn to survive in the wild. I have.

Entries.DialogueText: I think we all have a hidden urge to return to nature. It's just a little scary to make the leap.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think we all have a hidden urge to return to nature. It's just a little scary to make the leap.

Entries.DialogueText: I spend a lot of time thinking.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I spend a lot of thinking.

Entries.DialogueText: If you can fully understand the reasons behind your thoughts, you'll have reached a new level of being.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you can fully understand the reasons behind your thoughts, you'll have reached a new level of being.

Entries.DialogueText: I have to be wary of strangers. Most people don't like a 'wild man'.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have to be wary of strangers. Most people don't like a 'wild man'.

Entries.DialogueText: The people here seem nice, but they avoid me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The people here seem nice, but they avoid me.

Entries.DialogueText: People are afraid of the unknown. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: People are afraid of the unknown.

Entries.DialogueText: You can learn a lot from trees.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can learn a lot from trees.

Entries.DialogueText: Spend time with them and they might tell you their secrets.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Spend with them and they might tell you their secrets.

Entries.DialogueText: Go in peace, young one.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Go in peace, young one.

Entries.DialogueText: I have everything I need to survive, and more. Nature plays a wonderful tune if you can only learn to listen.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have everything I need to survive, and more. Nature plays a wonderful tune if you can only learn to listen.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} linusVandal
Entries.DisplayPattern: # linusVandal

Entries.DialogueText: Someone was throwing rocks at my tent last night... I just had to wait it out. {Portrait:Sad}$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: Someone was throwing rocks at my tent last night... I just had to wait it out.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't like to stay in one place for too long. There's just too much to experience in the world.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't like to stay in one for too long. There's just too much to experience in the world.

Entries.DialogueText: During all these years I've discovered a few secrets about life.
Entries.DisplayPattern: During all these years I've discovered a few secrets about life.

Entries.DialogueText: You'll have to find out for yourself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'll have to find out for yourself.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} LinusHeron
Entries.DisplayPattern: # LinusHeron

Entries.DialogueText: I saw a heron wading gracefully through the morning mist. Such are the treasures of a quiet life.$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw a heron wading gracefully through the morning mist. Such are the treasures of a quiet life.

Entries.DialogueText: It's so easy to get caught up in the noise of modern life. Your best years will pass you by in a formless blur. That's why you've got to learn to slow down.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's so easy to get caught up in the noise of modern life. Your best years will pass you by in a formless blur. That's why you've got to learn to slow down.

Entries.DialogueText: How have you been, my young friend?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How have you been, my young friend?

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... summer. The warm sun heats up the cans for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... summer. The warm sun heats up the cans for me.

Entries.DialogueText: Then at night I've got a warm meal to look forward to.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Then at night I've got a warm meal to look forward to.

Entries.DialogueText: I have my own reasons for living alone like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have my own reasons for living alone like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Some things are best left unsaid...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some things are best left unsaid...

Entries.DialogueText: I should do some foraging.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I should do some foraging.

Entries.DialogueText: Whenever you catch a fish, take a moment to thank it for its sacrifice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whenever you catch a fish, take a moment to thank it for its sacrifice.

Entries.DialogueText: Even if you don't believe in the spirit of the fish, it's a good mental exercise. We need to be aware of our effect on the environment.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Even if you don't believe in the spirit of the fish, it's a good mental exercise. We need to be aware of our effect on the environment.

Entries.DialogueText: You can find rainbow trout in streams right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can find rainbow trout in streams right now.

Entries.DialogueText: This is an easier time of year for me. I don't have to worry about staying warm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is an easier of year for me. I don't have to worry about staying warm.

Entries.DialogueText: Plus, the fruits of the wild are growing everywhere.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Plus, the fruits of the wild are growing everywhere.

Entries.DialogueText: I've explored deep into the caves.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've explored deep into the caves.

Entries.DialogueText: They hold some hidden secrets.
Entries.DisplayPattern: They hold some hidden secrets.

Entries.DialogueText: Just be cautious if you go in there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just be cautious if you go in there.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} LinusFall1
Entries.DisplayPattern: # LinusFall1

Entries.DialogueText: Some joker sprayed paint all over my home during the night... It took hours to scrub it off this morning.$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some joker sprayed paint all over my home during the night... It took hours to scrub it off this morning.

Entries.DialogueText: I need to start gathering lumber for the winter.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I need to start gathering lumber for the winter.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you have enough lumber to keep your house warm?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you have enough lumber to keep your house warm?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't have many responsibilities, so I spend my time thinking.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't have many responsibilities, so I spend my thinking.

Entries.DialogueText: You have to understand your thoughts before you can control them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You have to understand your thoughts before you can control them.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't like to stay in one place for too long.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't like to stay in one for too long.

Entries.DialogueText: There's nothing quite like a feast of wild mushrooms in the fall. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's nothing quite like a feast of wild mushrooms in the fall.

Entries.DialogueText: It can get really cold if you live in a tent. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It can get really cold if you live in a tent.

Entries.DialogueText: After you've truly unplugged from the modern way of life, you'll start to really enjoy the simple things... like the sun, a ripe fruit, or finding a stick with the exact shape you were looking for.
Entries.DisplayPattern: After you've truly unplugged from the modern way of life, you'll start to really enjoy the simple things... like the sun, a ripe fruit, or finding a stick with the exact shape you were looking for.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for not shunning me, {Farmer_Name}. It takes a lot of wisdom to override your base instincts.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for not shunning me, . It takes a lot of wisdom to override your base instincts.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm a human like everyone else. I just have a different lifestyle.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm a human like everyone else. I just have a different lifestyle.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sure you understand why I'm cautious of strangers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sure you understand why I'm cautious of strangers.

Entries.DialogueText: But let's put that in the past, okay? You and I are friends now, I think.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But let's put that in the past, okay? You and I are friends now, I think.

Entries.DialogueText: Winter is tough, but you can still fish and forage to get by.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Winter is tough, but you can still fish and forage to get by.

Entries.DialogueText: If you have any animals you should keep them inside.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you have any animals you should keep them inside.

Entries.DialogueText: The trees go to sleep during the winter. It makes it a bit lonely out here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The trees go to sleep during the winter. It makes it a bit lonely out here.

Entries.DialogueText: But I wouldn't deny them their beauty sleep. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I wouldn't deny them their beauty sleep.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for stopping by. I was actually feeling a little lonely this morning.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for stopping by. I was actually feeling a little lonely this morning.

Entries.DialogueText: So, have you discovered anything interesting in the mines?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, have you discovered anything interesting in the mines?

Entries.DialogueText: Sleeping on the ground is good for my back.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sleeping on the ground is good for my back.

Entries.DialogueText: It's best to look at the positive side of things. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's best to look at the positive side of things.

Entries.DialogueText: A warm rain is a pleasant way to get clean. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A warm rain is a pleasant way to get clean.

Entries.DialogueText: It was me... I'm sorry. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was me... I'm sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: I find a lot of hot, fresh food in these cans... stuff that will go to waste if I don't take it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I find a lot of hot, fresh food in these cans... stuff that will go to waste if I don't take it.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think there's something wrong with what I'm doing?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think there's something wrong with what I'm doing?

Entries.DialogueText: Disgusting to you, maybe. To me, it's a way of life. And I haven't gotten sick yet. I only eat things that look fresh.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Disgusting to you, maybe. To me, it's a way of life. And I haven't gotten sick yet. I only eat things that look fresh.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, {Farmer_Name}. I knew you were an open-minded person. I feel good about what I'm doing. I'm not harming anyone. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, . I knew you were an open-minded person. I feel good about what I'm doing. I'm not harming anyone.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't believe in 'private property
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't believe in 'private property

Entries.DialogueText: Not everyone's cut out for this world, {Farmer_Name}. You don't know what it's like to be me. I'm not harming anyone, I just want to live life in my own way. Is that so wrong?'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not everyone's cut out for this world, . You don't know what it's like to be me. I'm not harming anyone, I just want to live life in my own way. Is that so wrong?'

Entries.DialogueText: You can go on home. I promise I won't rummage in George's can anymore.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can go on home. I promise I won't rummage in George's can anymore.

Entries.DialogueText: You can tell him you scared off the raccoons for good.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can tell him you scared off the raccoons for good.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}! Come stand next to the firepit. It feels great.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ! Come stand next to the firepit. It feels great.

Entries.DialogueText: I was hoping you'd come by sometime.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was hoping you'd come by some.

Entries.DialogueText: I wanted to say sorry for mistrusting you at first. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanted to say sorry for mistrusting you at first.

Entries.DialogueText: Most people don't treat me well, so I've learned to be cautious. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Most people don't treat me well, so I've learned to be cautious.

Entries.DialogueText: But you've been uncommonly nice to me. You're a unique person. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But you've been uncommonly nice to me. You're a unique person.

Entries.DialogueText: ...And I consider you a good friend.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...And I consider you a good friend.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I want to show you something. Come inside. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I want to show you something. Come inside.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... there we go. See this? It's a special kind of fish bait that I make.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... there we go. See this? It's a special kind of fish bait that I make.

Entries.DialogueText: It's top quality stuff... I'd eat it myself!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's top quality stuff... I'd eat it myself!

Entries.DialogueText: Here, I want you to have the recipe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, I want you to have the recipe.

Entries.DialogueText: Learned how to craft 'Wild Bait'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Learned how to craft 'Wild Bait'

Entries.DialogueText: That's very nice of you, but no thanks! I've had great luck foraging today. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's very nice of you, but no thanks! I've had great luck foraging today.

Entries.DialogueText: Er... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er...

Entries.DialogueText: Um... No, thanks. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... No, thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: I appreciate the kindness... I really do... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I appreciate the kindness... I really do...

Entries.DialogueText: But... I've told you before... I choose to live this way...
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... I've told you before... I choose to live this way...

Entries.DialogueText: I like to be alone most of the time... I like the quiet sounds... moving with the rhythm of nature...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like to be alone most of the ... I like the quiet sounds... moving with the rhythm of nature...

Entries.DialogueText: It's a way of life that I'm comfortable with. I don't ever want to change that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a way of life that I'm comfortable with. I don't ever want to change that.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}... I cherish our friendship very much. And I know you do, too. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... I cherish our friendship very much. And I know you do, too.

Entries.DialogueText: But... You don't need to try and 'help' me... I know best how to live my own life... okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... You don't need to try and 'help' me... I know best how to live my own life... okay?

Entries.DialogueText: ...can you smell that? It's the sweet aroma of ripe berries... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...can you smell that? It's the sweet aroma of ripe berries...

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, {Farmer_Name}. You had me worried, there... I thought you were going to ask me to move on to the farm with you! *wink*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, . You had me worried, there... I thought you were going to ask me to move on to the with you! *wink*

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I consider you my closest friend in the valley... you've never tried to 'fix' me... you respect my way of life, even if you don't understand it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I consider you my closest friend in the valley... you've never tried to 'fix' me... you respect my way of life, even if you don't understand it.

Entries.DialogueText: I really appreciate that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I really appreciate that.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... can you smell that? It's the sweet aroma of ripe berries... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... can you smell that? It's the sweet aroma of ripe berries...

Entries.DialogueText: Ahhh... that feels good. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahhh... that feels good.

Entries.DialogueText: The water's never been cleaner. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The water's never been cleaner.

Entries.DialogueText: ...And the same goes for me! Hehehe. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...And the same goes for me! Hehehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Not yet...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not yet...

Entries.DialogueText: Wait!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wait!

Entries.DialogueText: Hello, Leo... My name's Linus.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, Leo... My 's Linus.

Entries.DialogueText: I've heard all about you, and your parrot family.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've heard all about you, and your parrot family.

Entries.DialogueText: It's really something special! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's really something special!

Entries.DialogueText: Leo...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Leo...

Entries.DialogueText: I'd like you to come back with us, to Stardew Valley.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd like you to come back with us, to Stardew Valley.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a beautiful place... not as warm as here, but still full of life... and I live right in the middle of it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a beautiful ... not as warm as here, but still full of life... and I live right in the middle of it!

Entries.DialogueText: I know the lay of the land, and many things about the waters, the trees, the animals, and more...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know the lay of the land, and many things about the waters, the trees, the animals, and more...

Entries.DialogueText: You see... I'm a child of nature, too. You might say we're 'birds of a feather'. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see... I'm a child of nature, too. You might say we're 'birds of a feather'.

Entries.DialogueText: But, I'm getting old... And I'd like to teach someone all that I've learned before moving on... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But, I'm getting old... And I'd like to teach someone all that I've learned before moving on...

Entries.DialogueText: Leo... will you come back with us?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Leo... will you come back with us?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, let's not forget... the choice is really up to Leo...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, let's not forget... the choice is really up to Leo...

Entries.DialogueText: I understand. This is Leo's home, after all. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I understand. This is Leo's home, after all.

Entries.DialogueText: ...It's hard to make changes. But sometimes it's for the best.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...It's hard to make changes. But somes it's for the best.

Entries.DialogueText: Still... the choice is really up to Leo.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Still... the choice is really up to Leo.

Entries.DialogueText: Great!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Great!

Entries.DialogueText: These animals never judge people by their looks. The same can't be said for humans.
Entries.DisplayPattern: These animals never judge people by their looks. The same can't be said for humans.

Entries.DialogueText: Animals are kind of like little people... they also have feelings and emotions. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Animals are kind of like little people... they also have feelings and emotions.

Entries.DialogueText: Good show, old friend.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good show, old friend.

Entries.DialogueText: Haha! Another fine creation, my old friend. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Haha! Another fine creation, my old friend.

Entries.DialogueText: No one really talks to me... I just come for the deviled eggs.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No one really talks to me... I just come for the deviled eggs.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll just slip in a little later and have some food. I'm eyeing that scrumptious looking pie!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll just slip in a little later and have some food. I'm eyeing that scrumptious looking pie!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hello there. It's nice of you to talk to me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hello there. It's nice of you to talk to me.

Entries.DialogueText: Spring is almost over... what a shame.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Spring is almost over... what a shame.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you have a successful salmonberry harvest? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you have a successful salmonberry harvest?

Entries.DialogueText: I picked enough to make a sweet and tangy jelly! I brought some today for everyone to taste. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I picked enough to make a sweet and tangy jelly! I brought some today for everyone to taste.

Entries.DialogueText: A slow, continuous rotation is key to achieving the perfect roast.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A slow, continuous rotation is key to achieving the perfect roast.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, can you smell that? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, can you smell that?

Entries.DialogueText: It's a signal that the roast is almost ready! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a signal that the roast is almost ready!

Entries.DialogueText: I'll just sneak up when the jellies arrive... I don't want to bother anyone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll just sneak up when the jellies arrive... I don't want to bother anyone.

Entries.DialogueText: I noticed no one else was using this dock, so I quietly snuck down. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I noticed no one else was using this dock, so I quietly snuck down.

Entries.DialogueText: I like watching the jellies, too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like watching the jellies, too.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd join in... but I don't think I'm welcome. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd join in... but I don't think I'm welcome.

Entries.DialogueText: The mayor personally invited me to his table. I couldn't turn that down!
Entries.DisplayPattern: The mayor personally invited me to his table. I couldn't turn that down!

Entries.DialogueText: Igloo-building's an art I picked up from the tundra dwellers who live beyond the frozen sea.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Igloo-building's an art I picked up from the tundra dwellers who live beyond the frozen sea.

Entries.DialogueText: That was many years ago. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was many years ago.

Entries.DialogueText: An Igloo makes a nice home, but it's easier to just stay in my tent year-round.
Entries.DisplayPattern: An Igloo makes a nice home, but it's easier to just stay in my tent year-round.

Entries.DialogueText: Ahh... The forest has entered her long slumber for the winter... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahh... The forest has entered her long slumber for the winter...

Entries.DialogueText: This is wonderful! You've really made my day special.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is wonderful! You've really made my day special.

Entries.DialogueText: This is a great gift. Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a great gift. Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... This doesn't really do much for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... This doesn't really do much for me.

Entries.DialogueText: Why would you give this to me? Do you think I like junk just because I live in a tent? That's terrible.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why would you give this to me? Do you think I like junk just because I live in a tent? That's terrible.

Entries.DialogueText: A gift? How nice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A gift? How nice.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You're lucky I happened to pass by!
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You're lucky I happened to pass by!

Entries.DialogueText: Be a little more careful next time, okay? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Be a little more careful next , okay?

Entries.DialogueText: I feel out of place here... I hope I'm not bothering anyone. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel out of here... I hope I'm not bothering anyone.

Entries.DialogueText: Linus is looking at the floor...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Linus is looking at the floor...

Entries.DialogueText: Why stare at a screen when you could experience these things yourself? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why stare at a screen when you could experience these things yourself?

Entries.DialogueText: I feel out of place here... I hope I'm not bothering anyone. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel out of here... I hope I'm not bothering anyone.

Entries.DialogueText: Linus is looking at the floor...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Linus is looking at the floor...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not used to that much stimulation... sorry if I was a disappointing guest, {Farmer_Name}. I still appreciate your inviting me!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not used to that much stimulation... sorry if I was a disappointing guest, . I still appreciate your inviting me!

Entries.DialogueText: I hitched a ride underneath the bus.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hitched a ride underneath the bus.

Entries.DialogueText: You can't find this Calico Desert flavor anywhere else. Heheh... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can't find this Calico Desert flavor anywhere else. Heheh...
